prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rene Muller Papers Concerning French History, Accession #10113-p, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The notebooks were given to the Library by Mr. Rene Muller of Charlottesville, Virginia, on June 18, 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These additional papers of Rene Muller of Charlottesville, Virginia, consisting of sixteen items, ca. 1940-1970, include manuscript notebooks containing maps of various locations in France and its provinces complete with key and legends, manuscript notebooks documenting a French history timeline from 600 B.C. until 1961 A.D., and manuscript notebooks with French history tables and an index.

did.unittitle: French History Timeline: 600 B.C.- 1789 A.D., ca. 1940-1970
